rdf:Description.dc:title: Best practice guideline for workplace health & safety during pandemic influenza including employment standards rights and obligations 2009
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Employment and Immigration.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Document developed by the Government of Alberta with input from: Alberta Employment and Immigration, Alberta Health and Wellness and Alberta Corporate Human Resources under the planning set out in the Alberta Pandemic Influenza Operations Plan (March 2006).
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Influenza
Influenza, Human.
Risk Factors.
